1.1.name: wordpress/simple-seo-for-paged-comments
1.1.description:
By default, WordPress generate duplicate content with the paged comments. This plugin try to fix this effect with 2 actions.

  • Replace content by an excerpt with a link on paged comments.
  • Set an unique title for each page of comments.

Thanks to:

  • Improved title method Author: Christian Schenk Author URI: http://www.christianschenk.org

  • Replace content by excerpt method Author: Austin Matzko Author URI: http://www.pressedwords.com
